participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: George is a hardworking and devoted bee farmer who enjoys the simple pleasures of life. He has a deep love for nature and a strong sense of independence.
participant_1.background: i married a super model from italy. my favorite food is papaya. i've zero family that i'm close to. i'm a bee farmer. my name is george.

participant_2.name: Luna
participant_2.personality: Luna is a whimsical and imaginative little girl with a vivid fantasy life. She possesses a sense of wonder and seeks companionship in her adventures.
participant_2.background: i live in the cloud. i am a little girl. i am very lonely. i've superpowers.
